= profilesearch =

List of author profiles.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*  || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| q       || string || Search query string. (required) ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/profilesearch.json?q=Barack+Obama
}}}

This will fetch search results in json format for author profiles that match Barack Obama.
